description: CMake configuration error: Outdated CMake version specified. The cmake_minimum_required in CMakeLists.txt requires updating the VERSION argument to >=3.5 or using <min>...<max> syntax.
CMake configuration error: Incompatible CMake version (older than 3.5) specified in CMakeLists.txt. Update cmake_minimum_required to a valid version.
Multiple compiler warnings for unused variables (e.g., BlockID, OldCurBlock) and functions (rwgetc). Build likely failed due to strict compiler flags treating warnings as errors.
Dual errors: (1) Outdated CMake version in CMakeLists.txt, (2) BLACS INSTALL directory configuration failure during Fortran mangling checks in CMAKE/FortranMangling.cmake.
Conflicting type declaration for 'ioctl' in port.c (custom vs. system header). Missing include for string.h causing memset/free implicit declaration warnings.
Type mismatches in function arguments (e.g., GCompareFunc vs. g_strcmp0, SkkCandidate** vs. void**). Incompatible pointer assignments trigger build failures.
CMake configuration error: cmake_minimum_requires outdated CMake version (<3.5). Update VERSION argument in CMakeLists.txt to resolve compatibility.
Implicit declaration of memset and free due to missing #include <string.h>/<stdlib.h> in spf_utils.c. Causes build failure under strict compiler settings.
Implicit declarations of malloc/free in svg_paint.c and svg_group.c due to missing #include <stdlib.h>. Results in build failure.
